name: Pixel Kitty vs. The Roombas of Doom
name_original: Pixel Kitty vs. The Roombas of Doom
description:
If she fits, she sits.

Pixel Kitty needs to sit in all the boxes before the timer runs out. 

Catch fish for extra points and avoid the evil Roombas of Doom.

Use space to jump and left/right arrow keys to move.

Made for Mini Jam 80: Cats. Only one level for now, but Pixel Kitty may get more boxes to sit in someday.

Sounds made with BeepBox and ChipTone.

Font: Sci Fied Bitmap by dustBUST.
